column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Our server seemed a bit surprised
column2: but was really nice when we interrupted his greeting to order our entire meal along with a giant pitcher of sangria.  The sangria was delicious.  I was happy with the menu selections as well.  I have spent some time in Spain and it was nice to see some of my favorite tapas on the menu (padron peppers
column3: yum!).  The food was really good and the experience left us feeling great after a disastrous day.
